content: **sign up for my mailing list for exclusive coupons crochet alongs and more here 1 ** -happy lunar new year everyone 2025 is the year of the snake which is the 6th animal of the chinese zodiac snakes are associated with wisdom elegance charm and transformation people born in the year of the snake are said to be intuitive strategic and intelligent it s a custom to hand out red envelopes hong-bao filled with money on this holiday to wish others good fortune to help celebrate the occasion today s free pattern will show you how to make both *follow me in insta 2 for the latest pattern releases 1 https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80 2 https //www instagram com/curiouspapaya
